markdownRemark.html:
What is new?

Changes included in the Open Data Hub v2.4.0 release:

  • ODH Operator

    • fast channel(default): v2.4.0

  • ODH Dashboard v2.17.0-incubation

  • Data Science Pipelines Operator v1.6.0

  • ODH Notebook Controller v1.7.0-5

  • KServev0.11.1.0

  • Model Mesh Serving v0.11.1.0

  • Codeflare Operator 1349bad0

  • KubeRay 1ed78ffb2

  • TrustyAI Operator v1.11.1

NOTE: Please review the odh-operator v2.0 blog to learn more about the new DataScienceCluster CustomResourceDefinition that is replacing the KfDef deployment method.

NOTE2: Rolling channel will keep v1.11.0 as the last release for a while.

Notable Changes

  • With the release of ODH Operator version 2.4.0 on both fast and rolling channels, the API version is set to v1. We strongly recommend that you carefully review the upgrade instructions before proceeding with an upgrade from v2.0.0 or v2.1.0 to any later release.

The following is a list of components that are available in v2.4.0 release of from operator:

Technology Version Category
Open Data Hub Dashboard v2.17.0-incubation
Open Data Hub Notebook Images v1.7.0-5
Data Science Pipelines Operator v1.6.0
Codeflare Operator main branch on commit 1349bad0
KubeRay master branch on commit 1ed78ffb2
TrustyAI Operator v1.11.1
Model Mesh Serving v0.11.1.0
Kserve v0.11.1.0

NOTE: This is the first ODH release only supports v2 operator. If you are still running with v1 operator, we recommend you upgrade to v2 operator as soon as possible in order to get new features and fixes.

frontmatter.title: Open Data Hub 2.4.0 Release Guide

frontmatter.preview: Open Data Hub 2.4.0 was just released
